title: Drugs and treatments
description: Find our information on drugs and treatments for mental health problems, including psychiatric medication and different types of therapy.
cleaned_text: Got a minute to help? [Take our quick website survey>](https://wwindex.eu.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_a4PCz06xd5ZeFlc) Drugs and treatments [Antidepressants](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/antidepressants/) Explains what antidepressants are used for, how the medication works, possible side effects and information about withdrawal. [Antipsychotics](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/antipsychotics/) Explains what antipsychotics are used for, how the medication works, possible side effects and information about withdrawal. [Arts and creative therapies](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/talking-therapy-and-counselling/arts-and-creative-therapies/) Explains what arts and creative therapies are, the different types and how to access them. [Cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT)](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/talking-therapy-and-counselling/cognitive-behavioural-therapy-cbt/) Explains what CBT is, what it treats and how to find a therapist. Also includes guidance on how to try CBT by yourself. [Complementary and alternative therapies](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/complementary-and-alternative-therapies/) Explains what complementary and alternative therapies are, what they treat, how they are regulated, and how you can access them. [Deep brain stimulation (DBS)](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/deep-brain-stimulation-dbs/) Explains what deep brain stimulation (DBS) is, how it works, what are the side effects, and what to think about before having the treatment. [Dialectical behaviour therapy (DBT)](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/talking-therapy-and-counselling/dialectical-behaviour-therapy-dbt/) Explains what dialectical behaviour therapy is, who it can help, what happens during therapy and how to access it. [Ecotherapy](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/talking-therapy-and-counselling/ecotherapy/) Explains what ecotherapy is, the different types, and how to get involved in a programme. [Electroconvulsive therapy (ECT)](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/electroconvulsive-therapy-ect/) Explains what electroconvulsive therapy is, what it is for and what happens during the treatment. [Lithium and other mood stabilisers](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/lithium-and-other-mood-stabilisers/) Explains what mood stabilising drugs are, what they're used for, possible side effects and information about withdrawal. [Medication - general](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/medication/) Explains what psychiatric drugs are, what to know before taking them, and information on side effects and coming off medication. [Medication - stopping or coming off](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/medication-coming-off/) Explains how to come off medication safely, what you need to do before you start, and how to manage withdrawal symptoms. [Mindfulness](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/mindfulness/) Provides information on mindfulness, how to practise it and how it can help with mental health problems. [Neurosurgery for mental disorder (NMD)](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/neurosurgery-for-mental-disorder-nmd/) Explains what neurosurgery for mental disorder (NMD) is, how it works, what it can treat and whether it can be performed without your consent. [Sleeping pills and minor tranquillisers](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/sleeping-pills-and-minor-tranquillisers/) Explains what sleeping pills and minor tranquillisers are used for, how the medication works, possible side effects and information about withdrawal. [Sleeping pills and minor tranquillisers A-Z](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/sleeping-pills-and-minor-tranquillisers-a-z/) Lists each drug by name and provides more information on it. [St John's wort](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/complementary-and-alternative-therapies/st-john-s-wort/) Explains what St John's wort is, what it's used for and what side effects and interactions there are. [Talking therapy and counselling](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/talking-therapy-and-counselling/) Explains what talking therapies are, what happens during therapy, how to get the most from therapy and how to find a therapist. [Vagus nerve stimulation (VNS)](/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/vagus-nerve-stimulation-vns/) Explains what vagus nerve stimulation (VNS) is, how it works, what are the side effects, and what to think about before having the treatment.
